hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
cd /opt/build/scripts VERSION=`./check_dbversions.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -e devint`
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai02 report stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai02 oss_bar stop
print Beginning Rebuild from scratch for app/db to latest package version ${VERSION} print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
./kill_dbsessions.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -e scrum1
cd /opt/checkouts/dai-etl-feeder/src/main/resources/liquibase/cisys
echo "@genUser.scrum1.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.119)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum001)))'
STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployJarRebuild.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -t dai-etl-feeder -e scrum1 -r ${VERSION} -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.119:1522:scrum001" -p SC1_REPORTING_ODS -u SC1_REPORTING_ODS -c SC1_CAAS -b SC1_OSS_BAR -o SC1_BILLING -v
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai02 report start /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai02 oss_bar start
